availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Columbus, Kentucky, physician. Kentucky native. Graduated from medical school at Washington University in St. Louis, Missouri, in 1858. Physician in Columbus in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hickman County, Columbus District, p. 25. Find A Grave, "Dr John Summerfield Petrie (1833-1904)," Memorial #129163800, (http://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=129163800&ref=acom) (accessed 14 June 2016). Ancestry.com Directory of Deceased American Physicians, 1804-1929 [database online]. (Provo, Utah: MyFamily.com, Inc., 2004), JAMA Citation: 43:1714.
